languages.text: "Если бы мне раньше кто-то сказал, что я буду о таком помышлять, я бы, может, и лицо ему разбил. Но теперь я не вижу в подобных мыслях ереси".
"If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."
languages.original_text: "Если бы мне раньше кто-то сказал, что я буду о таком помышлять, я бы, может, и лицо ему разбил. Но теперь я не вижу в подобных мыслях ереси".

traits.locale_text: "If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."
"If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."
"If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."
"If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."
"If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."

languages.text: "Hätte mir früher jemand gesagt, dass ich einmal über solche Dinge grübeln würde, hätte ich ihm wahrscheinlich den Kopf eingeschlagen. Aber die Wahrheit ist, ich kann in solchen Gedanken keine Ketzerei mehr erkennen."
languages.original_text: "If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: "Hätte mir früher jemand gesagt, dass ich einmal über solche Dinge grübeln würde, hätte ich ihm wahrscheinlich den Kopf eingeschlagen. Aber die Wahrheit ist, ich kann in solchen Gedanken keine Ketzerei mehr erkennen."

languages.text: « Il y a encore peu de temps, si quiconque m'avait dit une telle chose, je l'aurais probablement massacré. Mais en vérité, je ne perçois plus d'hérésie dans ces pensées. »
languages.original_text: "If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: « Il y a encore peu de temps, si quiconque m'avait dit une telle chose, je l'aurais probablement massacré. Mais en vérité, je ne perçois plus d'hérésie dans ces pensées. »

languages.text: “换做以前，如果有人告诉我，说我以后会考虑这样的事情，我恐怕会一拳砸在那个人脸上。但老实说，如今我不再认为这些想法是异端邪说。”
languages.original_text: "If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: “换做以前，如果有人告诉我，说我以后会考虑这样的事情，我恐怕会一拳砸在那个人脸上。但老实说，如今我不再认为这些想法是异端邪说。”

languages.text: «Si alguien me hubiese dicho antes que pensaría de este modo, probablemente le habría saltado todos los dientes. Pero lo cierto es que ya no considero heréticas tales ideas».
languages.original_text: "If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguien me hubiese dicho antes que pensaría de este modo, probablemente le habría saltado todos los dientes. Pero lo cierto es que ya no considero heréticas tales ideas».

languages.text: 「そんなことを考えるようになるなんて誰かに言われたら、以前の私なら、そいつの顔を叩き潰してたでしょうね。ですが本当のところ、今ではそういう思考を異端だとは思っていません」
languages.original_text: "If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: 「そんなことを考えるようになるなんて誰かに言われたら、以前の私なら、そいつの顔を叩き潰してたでしょうね。ですが本当のところ、今ではそういう思考を異端だとは思っていません」

languages.text: "Vaktinde biri bana gelip böyle şeyler üzerine kafa yoracağımı söyleseydi muhtemelen suratını dağıtırdım. Ancak gerçek şu ki artık bu tür fikirlerde kâfirlik görmüyorum."
languages.original_text: "If anyone had told me before that I would be thinking about things like that, I probably would have caved their face in. But the truth is, I no longer see heresy in such thoughts."

traits.locale_text: "Vaktinde biri bana gelip böyle şeyler üzerine kafa yoracağımı söyleseydi muhtemelen suratını dağıtırdım. Ancak gerçek şu ki artık bu tür fikirlerde kâfirlik görmüyorum."
